aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content:
Developer with primary focus on Backend Java-Spring Boot. 

 I work on developing complete solutions and APIs for secure data handling, authentication integrated with social network logins, operational website and application, integration with payment methods, pipelines for cloud hosting, and automated deployment. 

 Knowledge in Java, C#, HTML, CSS, React, React Native, JavaScript, SQL, NoSQL, Containers (Docker and Kubernetes), Azure Cloud Computing, Google Cloud, Git, GitHub Actions, Postman, and Insomnia. 

 Planning of modern architecture prepared for easy implementation of future updates. Efficient databases with targeted indexing to ensure performance for both reading and writing. Experienced in identifying unnecessary loops (over loops) and optimizing processes. 

 Postgraduate Degree - Architecture and JAVA Development

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: Here you can showcase your projects.

myHealth.title: minha-saude.com
myHealth.description: A health management application that allows users to track their medical history, appointments, and medications. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility and integrated with a backend API for data storage and retrieval.

restaurantDelivery.title: Restaurant Delivery
restaurantDelivery.description: A food delivery application that connects users with local restaurants. Built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time order tracking and a user-friendly interface.
